overview:
Business Technologies (PVT) Ltd is the brainchild of Mr. Sufi. He focuses on the company’s vision, values, strategy and promotional activities as well as the development of its infrastructure to support the company’s upcoming Business practices and development.

He strongly believes that there can be no compromise in Customer Support and Services if a company has to attain great heights. Thus to ensure Business Technologies provides the very best, he himself shuffles between all the offices as well as various countries so that time is well spent with clients and in guiding Business Technologies own team members and executives. He possesses a great entrepreneurial drive and his ambition is to make Business Technologies a Pakistani brand known globally for its outstanding work and commitment. He attended the University of Wisconsin Madison, U.S.A for his bachelors.
